item.title: Rainbow Border
item.description: https://codepen.io/kyktommy/pen/bGBBBZL Outside box fill with rainbow gradient background Inside box fill with solid background color /* .box > .inner */ .box { width: 100px; height: 100px; padding: 3px; box-sizing: border-box; background-image: linear-gradient( to bottom right, #b827fc 0%, #2c90fc 25%, #b8fd33 50%, #fec837 75%, #fd1892 100% ); } .inner { width: 100%; height: 100%; background: black; } New css version (safari not supporting) https://codepen.io/unnegative/pen/dVwYBq
